column4: hey guys, heres a question... i want to know if it is possible to use the DVD drive from on my ubuntu laptop, from my windows XP PC.... i would like to burn some avi files and make DVDs
does anyone know if this is possible?
does anyone know if it is possible to use the DVD drive from my laptop, on my windows desktop???
I've never seen it done.  Reading a drive is possible, but burning is complicated.  Hard enough getting it to work at all, let alone via the network.
